message: Let's be fair, 60-40 is a good deal!
Your turn Alice. I need a bit more than that to make it worth it. How about this?
I can do 58-42, it's the best I can offer for now.
This is getting ridiculous Alice.  Meet me in the middle or it's not worth it.
I'll go down a bit, but not too much. This is my new offer.
Alice, this is getting painful.  I'm losing money every round! Take this deal.
You're losing value every round, I'm not. My offer is still generous.
Alice, this is my final offer. Take it or leave it. I won't accept anything less.
You said that was your final offer, but I'm not buying it. I think you'll take this deal.
Alice, we're running out of time!  I'm taking a hit on this, but we both need to get something.
We're running out of time indeed. This is a good compromise.
